channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15196] HBASE-15158 Preamble 2 of 2:Add Increment tests
item.description: Add the tests that were added by parent issue HBASE-15158; adds IncrementPerformanceTest, TestRegionIncrement, and moves Increment testing 'from client side' out into own test suite. This stuff is mostly forward-post of tests committed to branch-1 to test increment regressions 'narorow' fix (See HBASE-15031). We are adding the tests separately here in an effort at making the HBASE-15158 patch smaller. This is preamble 2 of 2. Preamble 1 was HBASE-15186

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Make it so Region#getReadPoint always takes an isolation level.

Forward port tests from HBASE-15031, the increment regression fix applied to branch-1.0.

-1 overall

Thanks Elliott Clark Will fix on commit.

jdk7 tests all passed. The jdk8 failure is because: "hbase-server: There was a timeout or other error in the fork" ... but nothing if I run findHangingTest.py.... Let me commit.
Pushed to master branch. Thanks Elliott Clark for review.
